bill_title: allow disabled veterans to obtain a standard issue county motor vehicle or motorcycle license plate.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to allow disabled veterans to obtain a standard issue county motor vehicle or motorcycle license plate. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 32-5 be amended with a NEW SECTION: A disabled veteran may obtain standard issue county motor vehicle or motorcycle license plates in lieu of disabled veteran plates if the disabled veteran meets the requirements listed in §§ 32-5-156 and 32-5-157. A disabled veteran who obtains plates pursuant to this section shall pay fees according to § 32-5-160.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
